import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Row,Container,Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import data from '../../data/Trip.json' import NavbarComp from '../../components/navbar/NavbarComp' import './styledet.css' function DetailPage({match}) { const [detail,setDetail] = useState({}) const id = match.params.id useEffect( () => { setDetail(data[id]) },[detail] ) return ( <>

{detail.title}

{detail.country}

) } export default DetailPage
